description: This file defines a Python class JiraClient for interacting asynchronously with the Jira REST API, including functions for searching, creating, updating issues, managing sprints, and more. It also defines a custom exception JiraClientError for handling errors.

classes.name: JiraClientError
classes.description: Custom exception class to represent errors interacting with Jira API.

classes.name: JiraClient
classes.description: Primary class providing async methods to interact with Jira REST API, including issue management, sprint management, and custom field handling.

methods.name: httpx.AsyncClient _get_client(self)
methods.description: Initializes and returns an httpx.AsyncClient instance with proper headers.

methods.name: str _basic_token(self)
methods.description: Generates a Basic Auth token from email and API token.

methods.name: httpx.Response _request_with_retries(self, method: str, url: str, **kwargs)
methods.description: Performs HTTP requests with retries on server errors, rate limiting, and network errors.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] search_issues(self, jql: str, fields: Optional[List[str]] = None, max_results: int = 25)
methods.description: Searches issues using JQL.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_issue(self, project_key: str, summary: str, description: Optional[str], issuetype: str)
methods.description: Creates a new Jira issue.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] get_field_mappings(self)
methods.description: Discovers and caches custom field IDs based on display names.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_epic(self, request: Any)
methods.description: Creates an Epic issue with the specified parameters.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_story(self, request: Any)
methods.description: Creates a Story issue and links to an epic, sets story points, if provided.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] link_issue_to_epic(self, epic_key_or_id: str, issue_key_or_id: str)
methods.description: Links an issue to an epic using the Epic Link custom field.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_transitions(self, issue_key: str)
methods.description: Fetches available transitions for an issue.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] transition_issue(self, issue_key: str, transition_id: str)
methods.description: Performs a transition on an issue.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] add_comment(self, issue_key: str, body: str)
methods.description: Adds a comment to a Jira issue.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] estimate_story_points(self, issue_key: str, points: float)
methods.description: Sets story points on an issue.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_boards(self, project_key_or_id: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Lists Jira boards, optionally filtered by project.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_sprints(self, board_id: int, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Lists sprints for a given board.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_sprint(self, payload: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates a new sprint.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] update_sprint(self, sprint_id: int, payload: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Updates an existing sprint.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] move_issues_to_sprint(self, sprint_id: int, issue_keys: List[str])
methods.description: Moves multiple issues into a specified sprint.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_sprint_issues(self, sprint_id: int, jql_filters: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Retrieves issues for a specific sprint, with optional JQL filters.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] search_issues_via_params( self, project: Optional[str] = None, board_id: Optional[int] = None, sprint_id: Optional[int] = None, assignee: Optional[str] = None, status: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Builds and executes a Jira issue search based on various parameters.

methods.description: Closes the underlying HTTP client session.

methods.description: Returns a JiraClient instance configured with application settings for dependency injection.
